# Social Media Configuration

## Repository Information

**Website**: https://neskeep.com
**Homepage**: https://github.com/neskeep/nuxt-cms-module#readme

## Description
A powerful, developer-friendly headless CMS module for Nuxt 3/4 with multi-database support, i18n, and beautiful admin panel

## Topics (max 20)
nuxt, nuxt3, nuxt4, cms, headless-cms, content-management, typescript, drizzle-orm, sqlite, postgresql, i18n, internationalization, admin-panel, vue3, nuxt-module, self-hosted, open-source, developer-tools, content-management-system, rbac
